main event: Three witnesses reported seeing a metallic, cigar-shaped object in the sky in Mt. Clemens, Michigan.
interesting points: The object was described as hovering and later accelerated rapidly,The sighting occurred on January 11, 1967, at 1630,Weather conditions were clear during the sighting,The witnesses included two high school students,No further details about the object were provided in the report.
witnesses: two high school students and one additional witness
